item.title: 연습글
item.description: <script src="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/header-attrs/header-attrs.js"></script> <script src="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/htmlwidgets/htmlwidgets.js"></script> <script src="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script> <link href="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/datatables-css/datatables-crosstalk.css" rel="stylesheet" /> <script src="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/datatables-binding/datatables.js"></script> <link href="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/dt-core/css/jquery.dataTables.min.css" rel="stylesheet" /> <link href="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/dt-core/css/jquery.dataTables.extra.css" rel="stylesheet" /> <script src="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/dt-core/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js"></script> <link href="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/nouislider/jquery.nouislider.min.css" rel="stylesheet" /> <script src="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/nouislider/jquery.nouislider.min.js"></script> <link href="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/selectize/selectize.bootstrap3.css" rel="stylesheet" /> <script src="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/selectize/selectize.min.js"></script> <link href="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/crosstalk/css/crosstalk.css" rel="stylesheet" /> <script src="https://jangcci.netlify.app/rmarkdown-libs/crosstalk/js/crosstalk.min.js"></script>

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

item.title: Welcome to Tranquilpeak 0.4.8-BETA
item.description: Tranquilpeak is a gorgeous responsive theme for Hugo blog framework. It has many features and integrated services to improve user experience.

item.title: Elements showcase
item.description: Check out how Tranquilpeak theme display well HTML elements (title, paragraph, blockquote, table and more..). It’s simple and elegant.

item.title: Cover image showcase
item.description: Tranquilpeak integrate a unique “cover image” feature. Open this post to see how this feature sublimate your article.

item.title: highlighted code showcase
item.description: Tranquilpeak Hugo theme have its own theme to highlight source code. It’s based on GitHub theme: simple and elegant. Check out how it sublimate source codes.

item.title: Tags plugins showcase
item.description: This post is used to show how tag plugins are displayed. See docs for more info.

item.title: Hidden social section showcase
item.description: This post is used to show how a site looks if the social section is hidden.

item.title: Hidden tag section showcase
item.description: This post is used to show how a site looks if the tag section is hidden.

item.title: Hidden pagination showcase
item.description: This post is used to show how a site looks if the pagination is hidden.

item.title: Video integrations showcase
item.description: Youtube and Vimeo videos are easily integrated thanks to tags plugins. Of course, you can add video other platforms like dailymotion.
